alert.note: Alert for Caldwell; Comal; Guadalupe; Hays (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Caldwell, southeastern Hays, central Guadalupe and southeastern Comal Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 330 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Martindale to near Kingsbury. Movement was west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New Braunfels, San Marcos, Kyle, Seguin, Canyon Lake, McQueeney, Martindale, Marion, Uhland, Kingsbury, Santa Clara, Staples, Fentress, Geronimo, Zorn, Maxwell, Reedville, Redwood, Freiheit and Hunter. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
